songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ay, yuh, ay
I'm moving slow like an eighth when it drop
If you round my, ay

[Chorus]
I'm moving slow like an eighth when it drop
If you round my block then you gon' get it out the pot
Get the work the magic, see this wrist ain't never lied
I'm from Palm Beach County, I’m a boy that’s always hot
I feel like you got a death wish, obsessing with me
Claiming that it's space but it's just distance from me
I feel like you got a death wish, obsessing with me
Claiming that it's space but it's just distance from me

[Verse]
Hold up, watch me skrrt off on these niggas, they some past tense
20 thousand blasting off my face, I'm so extravagant
Girl you fucking with a brown demon, they now sleeping
I'm smokin' woods and my grave scheming, my diamonds blingin'
I'm flexing '99 Weezy, little shawty peep me
Seen this from afar we plottin', wasn't on no drink shit
Like ooh, why you do it to me, willin' like you knew me
All these rappers groupies, all these rappers groupies
I just fucked up on the sack, the plug he think I'm using
But I'm running with the work and laughing cause he's stupid
I just fucked up on some bands and mix 'em without moving
People cancerous, my energy for me they using
If I can't secure the bag then I'm gon' keep it moving
And if my enemy ain’t me, he gone just need a movement
I smoke exotic in my wood shit, now I'm barely moving
Too much ice around my neck, ain't no need for a cooler

[Chorus]
I'm moving slow like an eighth when it drop
If you round my block then you gon' get it out the pot
Get the work the magic, see this wrist ain't never lied
I'm from Palm Beach County, I’m a boy that’s always hot
I feel like you got a death wish, obsessing with me
Claiming that it's space but it's just distance from me
I feel like you got a death wish, obsessing with me
Claiming that it's space but it's just distance from me
songs.title: Death Wish
